cause.description:
people around the city have been kicked off tennis courts and other areas for playing street hockey i know its called "STREET" hockey but a fenced off area were the balls dont go flying would be nice and a flat smooth area cause most of the streets suck to play on! so we need to get our own place to play!
1. WE NEED OUR OWN PLACE TO PLAY!
cause.mission: get specific places to play street hockey year round so we dont get kicked off tennis courts
cause.name: A PLACE TO PLAY
